name: Messari
title: XNet's Richard DeVaul on decentralized wireless on Fully Diluted with Messari Research
text:
Synopsis
Helium Mobile operates as an MVNO (Mobile Virtual Network Operator) using T-Mobile's network, with a unique approach of leveraging its own radios to reduce operational costs, but facing typical challenges of the mobile service provider market.

Key Insights
- Helium Mobile has over 200,000 subscribers
- The business model involves selling mobile plans directly to individual users
- Phones preferentially connect to Helium's own radios where available, reducing network costs
- The mobile service market is challenging, with typical characteristics including:
  - Approximately 20% customer churn per year
  - Thin profit margins
- Positioned similarly to other MVNOs like Boost Mobile and Mint Mobile
- Operates in partnership with T-Mobile to provide network services
